Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Palawan Teachers College in Puerto Princesa City to the Palawan State College and Authorizing the Same to Continue Offering its Present Collegiate Courses
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 797
An Act Changing the Name of the Palawan Teachers College in Puerto Princesa City to the Palawan State College and Authorizing the Same to Continue Offering its Present Collegiate Courses
Section 1. The name of the Palawan Teachers College in Puerto Princesa City to the Palawan, is changed to Palawan State College.1awp++i1
Section 2. The Palawan State College is authorized to continue offering its present collegiate courses and other courses in arts, sciences and technology.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 27, 1984
